# dubbo-python

_Python Dubbo Client._
åŸºäºApache dubbo-python2 [å‚è€ƒ](https://github.com/apache/dubbo-python2)

## Installation

## Usage

#### åŸºç¡€ä½¿ç”¨

```python

# æ”¯æŒä»Zkä¸­è·å–æœåŠ¡çš„providerï¼Œæ”¯æŒæ ¹æ®providerçš„æƒé‡é€‰æ‹©ä¸»æœº
```
